name: Light Scales
description:
Light Scales

Explore the charming caves collecting blue orbs and find your lost friends!

Play on Full Screen!

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard:

WASD: Move
Mouse: Look
Space: Ascend
Left Shift: Descend
Left Click: Swim faster
R: Respawn Controller: Left Joystick: Move
Right Joystick: Look
B: Ascend
X: Descend
Right Trigger: Swim Faster 
Left Trigger: Respawn
